Title: A Flame, Extinguished
Description:
Sarkareth is no more.

His hubris left him vulnerable to the dark influences that have assaulted our flight for millennia. Just like Neltharion before him.

I believe Emberthal seeks more answers than what Wrathion and Sabellian are able to give. She may need some assistance.

Objectives.Text: Experience the retelling of Sarkareth's fate
Speak to Wrathion or Sabellian to enter Aberrus
